message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?  This still gives you a great deal, and I'm willing to be flexible to make this work.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,750, but no more. Can we meet at this price?
